title: Nunna hrui thlung ru tui fawn hlauhawmah
lyrics:
Nunna hrui thlung r'u, tui fawn hlauhawmah,
Unau boral tur, chhan ngai a awm e,
Tu unau nge ni, tu nge chhan chhuak ang,
A tan nunna hrui thlun siama pui turin?

Nunna hrui thlung r'u, nunna hrui thlung r'u,
Tui fawnin a len bo mek;
Nunna hrui thlung r'u, nunna hrui thlung r'u,
Tui fawnah an pil mek e.

Nunna hrui thlung r'u, chak leh rang takin,
Engah nge I muan, I awm muan mai le?
En the, an pil mek, aw hmanhmawh langin,
Nunna lawng nen chuanin lo kal thuai ang che.

Nunna hrui thlung r'u, hlauva khatte tan,
Thlen loh chinah mangangin an pil e;
Thlemna thlipui leh lungngaih tuifawn chuan,
Tuipui thuk lamah chuan a len bo mek e.

Chhanhim nan hun rei kan nei tawh lo vang,
Chatuan ramah chuan an lut thuai dawn e;
Ka unau, hmanhmawh la, I tlai ang e,
Nunna hrui chu thlung r'u, tunah chhandam r'u.
